scripts.build-prod: browserify index.js -t babelify --outfile www/bundle.js  -p [ parcelify -o www/bundle.css  ]
scripts.build: browserify index.js --debug -t babelify --outfile www/bundle.js  -p [ parcelify -o www/bundle.css  ]
scripts.watch: watchify index.js --debug --verbose -t babelify --outfile www/bundle.js  -p [ parcelify -o www/bundle.css  ]
